name: stig-management-api
description: An API for managing evaluations of Security Technical Implementation Guide (STIG) assessments.

scripts.start-for-coverage: cross-env STIGMAN_API_PORT=64001 STIGMAN_DB_HOST=localhost STIGMAN_DB_PASSWORD=stigman STIGMAN_OIDC_PROVIDER=http://localhost:8080/auth/realms/stigman NODE_V8_COVERAGE=$INIT_CWD/coverage/tmp npm run start
scripts.pretest:db: docker run --name stig-manager-db-test -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=rootpw -e MYSQL_DATABASE=stigman -e MYSQL_USER=stigman -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=stigman mysql:8.0.32 --innodb-buffer-pool-size=512M --sort_buffer_size=100M
scripts.pretest2: npm --prefix ../../test/api/ install && docker run --name stig-manager-db-npmtest -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=rootpw -e MYSQL_DATABASE=stigman -e MYSQL_USER=stigman -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=stigman mysql:8.0.32 || docker start stig-manager-db-npmtest           && docker run --name stig-manager-auth-npmtest -d -p 8080:8080 -p 8443:8443 nuwcdivnpt/stig-manager-auth || docker start stig-manager-auth-npmtest
scripts.app-start-for-tests: cross-env STIGMAN_API_PORT=64001 STIGMAN_DB_HOST=localhost STIGMAN_DB_PASSWORD=stigman STIGMAN_OIDC_PROVIDER=http://localhost:8080/realms/stigman node index.js
